description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the Microsoft Edge (Chromium-based) spoofing vulnerability CVE-2024-38082:

1. Update your Microsoft Edge (Chromium-based) to version 126.0.2592.68.
2. Visit the official update catalog or use the update feature within Edge to ensure your application is current.

**Details**:
- This update addresses a vulnerability that allows spoofing and is deemed to have low severity. It is important to keep your browser updated to mitigate potential security risks.
- The update package can be found at: https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB38082.

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure you are using Microsoft Edge (Chromium-based) version prior to 126.0.2592.68.
- Backup any current settings or bookmarks before proceeding with the update.
